text:
## ✅ **Disclaimer Updated for Educational Purposes!**

Successfully updated all disclaimer text across the entire application to specify **educational purposes only**:

### **🔧 Changes Made:**

**Translation Files Updated (7 Languages):**
- 🇺🇸 **English**: "This tool is for educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical judgment or clinical evaluation"
- 🇳🇱 **Dutch**: "Deze tool is alleen voor educatieve doeleinden en vervangt geen professioneel medisch oordeel of klinische evaluatie"
- 🇩🇰 **Danish**: "Dette værktøj er kun til uddannelsesmæssige formål og erstatter ikke professionel medicinsk vurdering eller klinisk evaluering"
- 🇩🇪 **German**: "Dieses Tool dient nur zu Bildungszwecken und ersetzt nicht die professionelle medizinische Beurteilung oder klinische Evaluation"
- 🇸🇪 **Swedish**: "Detta verktyg är endast för utbildningsändamål och ersätter inte professionell medicinsk bedömning eller klinisk utvärdering"
- 🇳🇴 **Norwegian**: "Dette verktøyet er kun for utdanningsformål og erstatter ikke profesjonell medisinsk vurdering eller klinisk evaluering"
- 🇫🇷 **French**: "Cet outil est uniquement à des fins éducatives et ne remplace pas le jugement médical professionnel ou l'évaluation clinique"

**Component Updates:**
- ✅ **Disclaimer Component**: Updated alert label from "Clinical Decision Support Tool" → "Educational Tool"
- ✅ **Footer Version**: Changed from "Clinical Decision Support Tool" → "Educational Tool"
- ✅ **Alert Description**: Updated context text to emphasize educational content
- ✅ **Badge**: Already correctly shows "Research & Education Use"

### **🔍 Before vs After:**

**Before:**
- "This screening tool is for clinical decision support only..."
- "Clinical Decision Support Tool"

**After:**
- "This tool is for educational purposes only..."
- "Educational Tool"

### **✅ Verification:**
- **Build succeeds** without errors
- **All 7 languages updated** consistently
- **Footer and main disclaimer** both reflect educational purpose
- **Consistent messaging** throughout the application

The app now clearly states its **educational purpose** across all languages and components, removing any implication of clinical decision support while maintaining the valuable educational content for healthcare professionals!
